articles.title: First look at WWI thriller 'All Quiet on the Western Front' is here - Military Times
articles.description: The classic World War I novel is getting the big screen treatment once again — this time in its native language.
articles.content:
The first trailer for Netflixs remake of All Quiet on the Western Front has arrived more than 90 years after the best-selling World War I book of the same name was first adapted for the big screen.

articles.title: Burning Man attendees report 8-hour traffic jam to leave festival, fuel shortages - Denver7
articles.description: The 15-lane vehicle gridlock just to leave the festival grounds to the main road reportedly lasted 6-13 hours.
articles.content: Long waits to leave festivals or other events isn't anything new, but for Burning Man fans leaving the multi-day gathering in the Black Rock Desert, the experience was a jaw-dropping brand of stress.… [+1714 chars]
